summary: Admin panel application for managing users and access control

existing_features.title: Create a new admin menu component that provides navigation to user data management, access control (block/unblock users), and other administrative functions
Create a user data management page that displays a list of all users with their profile information (name, email, registration date, and current status)
Implement user access blocking functionality that allows admins to block a user's access to the application
Implement user access unblocking functionality that allows admins to restore access for previously blocked users
Add admin dashboard statistics showing total users, blocked users, active users, and recent user registrations
Create an admin activity log page that displays recent administrative actions (blocks, unblocks, and other admin operations) with timestamps and admin identities
Add admin route protection to ensure all admin pages and components are only accessible to users with admin privileges

new_feature_requests.summary: Complete admin menu with user data access, block/unblock users, and other admin functions
Implement backend admin role authorization system to restrict admin functions to authorized users only
